TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IDataObject

summary.span: 在呼叫端與實作 IDataObject 介面的資料物件之間建立連線。

span.span: Creates a connection between a caller and a data object implementing the IDataObject interface.

summary.span: 此連線可以用來通知呼叫端資料物件的資料變更。

span.span: This connection enables notifications of changes in the data for the data object to the caller.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需有關使用 IDataObject 介面和 Microsoft Management Console (MMC) 進行程式設計的詳細資訊，請參閱[MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview)。For more information about programming with the IDataObject interface and the Microsoft Management Console (MMC), see the [MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview).

MemberSignature.Value: public int DAdvise (IntPtr a, int b, IntPtr c, ref int d);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 DAdvise(native int a, int32 b, native int c, int32& d) cil managed
Public Function DAdvise (a As IntPtr, b As Integer, c As IntPtr, ByRef d As Integer) As Integer
public: int DAdvise(IntPtr a, int b, IntPtr c, int % d);
abstract member DAdvise : nativeint * int * nativeint * -> int

param.name: a
param.span: 定義告知之格式、媒體和目標裝置的 指標。

span.span: A pointer to the defining the format, medium, and target device for notifications.

param.name: b
param.span: 值，指定連線的要求行為。

span.span: An value specifying the requested behavior for the connection.

param.name: c
param.span: 呼叫端物件上之 的指標。

span.span: A pointer to the on the caller object.

param.name: d
param.span: 由這個對 DAdvise 方法呼叫所建立的連線指標。

span.span: A pointer to the connection set up by this call to the DAdvise method.

summary.span: 建立實作 介面的資料物件與呼叫端物件之間的告知連接，讓呼叫端可以接收資料物件的資料變更告知。

span.span: Creates a notification connection between a data object implementing the interface and a caller object, letting the caller receive notification of changes in the data for the data object.

Docs.returns:
DAdvise 方法支援標準傳回值 E_INVALIDARG、E_UNEXPECTED 及 E_OUTOFMEMORY，以及下列傳回值：The DAdvise method supports the standard returns values E_INVALIDARG, E_UNEXPECTED, and E_OUTOFMEMORY, as well as the following return values:
| 傳回值 | 描述 | | --- | --- | | S\_OK | DAdvise 方法成功建立連線。| Return value | Description | | --- | --- | | S\_OK | The DAdvise method successfully created the connection. | | E\_NOTIMPL | 資料物件沒有實作 DAdvise 方法。| | E\_NOTIMPL | The data object does not implement the DAdvise method. | | DV\_E\_LINDEX | lindex 無效。| | DV\_E\_LINDEX | lindex is not valid. | | DV\_E\_FORMATETC | 資料指標值無效。| | DV\_E\_FORMATETC | The data pointer value is not valid. | | OLE\_E\_ADVISENOTSUPPORTED | 物件不支援變更通知。| | OLE\_E\_ADVISENOTSUPPORTED | The object does not support change notification. |

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需有關使用程式設計介面和 Microsoft Management Console (MMC)，請參閱 < [MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview)。For more information about programming with the interface and the Microsoft Management Console (MMC), see the [MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview).

MemberSignature.Value: public int DUnadvise (int a);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 DUnadvise(int32 a) cil managed
Public Function DUnadvise (a As Integer) As Integer
public: int DUnadvise(int a);
abstract member DUnadvise : int -> int

span.span: The connection to destroy.

summary.span: 終結由先前對 方法之呼叫所建立的告知連接。

span.span: Destroys a notification connection that was created by an earlier call to the method.

Docs.returns: | 傳回值 | 描述 | | --- | --- | | S\_OK | DUnadvise 方法成功刪除指定連線。| Return value | Description | | --- | --- | | S\_OK | The DUnadvise method successfully deleted the specified connection. | | OLE\_E\_NOCONNECTION | 指定連線不是有效的連線。| | OLE\_E\_NOCONNECTION | The specified connection is not a valid connection. | | OLE\_E\_ADVISENOTSUPPORTED | 物件不支援變更通知。| | OLE\_E\_ADVISENOTSUPPORTED | The object does not support change notification. |

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需有關使用程式設計介面和 Microsoft Management Console (MMC)，請參閱 < [MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview)。For more information about programming with the interface and the Microsoft Management Console (MMC), see the [MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview).

Public Function EnumDAdvise (a As IntPtr) As Integer
public: int EnumDAdvise(IntPtr a);
abstract member EnumDAdvise : nativeint -> int

param.name: a
param.span: 接收新列舉值物件之介面指標的 位址。

span.span: The address of the receiving the interface pointer to the new enumerator object.

param.span: 若這個 EnumDAdvise 方法的呼叫將 設為 ，則沒有任何連線。

span.span: There are no connections if this call to the EnumDAdvise method sets to .

summary.span: 擷取物件的指標，該物件可以列舉目前由這個 介面所維護的告知連接。

span.span: Retrieves a pointer to an object that can enumerate the notification connections that are currently maintained by this interface.

Docs.returns:
EnumDAdvise 方法支援標準傳回值 E_OUTOFMEMORY，以及下列傳回值：The EnumDAdvise method supports the standard return value E_OUTOFMEMORY, as well as the following return values:
| 傳回值 | 描述 | | --- | --- | | S\_OK | 這個 EnumDAdvise 方法的呼叫已成功建立列舉程式物件執行個體。或者沒有任何連線。| Return value | Description | | --- | --- | | S\_OK | This call to the EnumDAdvise method successfully created the instance of the enumerator object.-or-There are no connections. | | OLE\_E\_ADVISENOTSUPPORTED | 物件不支援變更通知。| | OLE\_E\_ADVISENOTSUPPORTED | The object does not support change notification. |

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需有關使用程式設計介面和 Microsoft Management Console (MMC)，請參閱 < [MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview)。For more information about programming with the interface and the Microsoft Management Console (MMC), see the [MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview).

param.name: b
param.span: 接收 的輸出變數位址。

span.span: An output variable address receiving the .

summary.span: 擷取物件的指標，該物件可以列舉這個實作 (Implementation) 所支援的 列舉值型別。

span.span: Retrieves a pointer to an object that can enumerate the enumerator types that this implementation supports.

Docs.returns:
EnumFormatEtc 方法支援標準傳回值 E_INVALIDARG 和 E_OUTOFMEMORY，以及下列傳回值：The EnumFormatEtc method supports the standard return values E_INVALIDARG and E_OUTOFMEMORY, as well as the following return values:
| 傳回值 | 描述 | | --- | --- | | S\_OK | 這個 EnumFormatEtc 方法的呼叫已成功建立列舉程式物件。| Return value | Description | | --- | --- | | S\_OK | This call to the EnumFormatEtc method successfully created the enumerator object. | | E\_NOTIMPL | 不支援指定的方向。| | E\_NOTIMPL | The specified direction is not supported. | | OLE\_S\_USEREG | 從登錄中列舉格式的 OLE 要求。| | OLE\_S\_USEREG | A request to OLE to enumerate the formats from the registry. |

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需有關使用程式設計介面和 Microsoft Management Console (MMC)，請參閱 < [MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview)。For more information about programming with the interface and the Microsoft Management Console (MMC), see the [MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview).

MemberSignature.Value: public int GetCanonicalFormatEtc (IntPtr a, IntPtr b);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 GetCanonicalFormatEtc(native int a, native int b) cil managed
Public Function GetCanonicalFormatEtc (a As IntPtr, b As IntPtr) As Integer
public: int GetCanonicalFormatEtc(IntPtr a, IntPtr b);
abstract member GetCanonicalFormatEtc : nativeint * nativeint -> int

param.name: a
param.span: 定義格式、媒體和目標裝置，供呼叫擷取資料之 的指標。

span.span: A pointer to the defining the format, medium, and target device for calls to retrieve data.

param.name: b
param.span: 若 GetCanonicalFormatEtc 方法傳回 DATA_S_SAMEFORMATETC，則為 FORMATETC 的輸出指標，包含可能適用於特定呈現或 的最普遍資訊。

span.span: An output pointer to a FORMATETC containing the most general information possible for a specific rendering or , if the GetCanonicalFormatEtc method returns DATA_S_SAMEFORMATETC.

summary.span: 擷取標準 結構的指標，該結構與 參數所參考之 結構在邏輯上對等，但不一定相等。

span.span: Retrieves a pointer to a standard structure that is logically equivalent to, but not necessarily equal to, the structure that is referenced by the parameter.

Docs.returns:
GetCanonicalFormatEtc 方法支援標準傳回值 E_INVALIDARG、E_UNEXPECTED 和 E_OUTOFMEMORY，以及下列傳回值：The GetCanonicalFormatEtc method supports the standard return values E_INVALIDARG, E_UNEXPECTED, and E_OUTOFMEMORY, as well as the following return values:
| 傳回值 | 描述 | | --- | --- | | S\_OK | 傳回的 FORMATETC 與參數中所傳遞的結構不同。| Return value | Description | | --- | --- | | S\_OK | The returned FORMATETC is different from the structure passed in the parameters. | | DATA\_S\_SAMEFORMATETC | 傳回的 FORMATETC 與參數中所傳遞的結構相同，且 已在 中傳回。| | DATA\_S\_SAMEFORMATETC | The returned FORMATETC is the same as the structure passed in the parameters and is returned in . | | DV\_E\_LINDEX | lindex 無效。| | DV\_E\_LINDEX | lindex is not valid. | | DV\_E\_FORMATETC | 無效。| | DV\_E\_FORMATETC | is not valid. | | OLE\_E\_NOTRUNNING | 物件應用程式不在執行中。| | OLE\_E\_NOTRUNNING | The object application is not running. |

remarks.format: ## Remarks GetCanonicalFormatEtc 方法可讓實作器介面，以傳回標準不含重複的轉譯邏輯的結構結構。The GetCanonicalFormatEtc method allows the implementer of the interface to return a canonical structure without duplicating the rendering logic for the structure. 如需有關使用程式設計介面和 Microsoft Management Console (MMC)，請參閱 < [MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview)。For more information about programming with the interface and the Microsoft Management Console (MMC), see the [MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview).

public: int GetData(Microsoft::Aspnet::Snapin::FORMATETC % pFormatEtc, Microsoft::Aspnet::Snapin::STGMEDIUM % b);
abstract member GetData : * -> int

param.name: pFormatEtc
param.span: 定義格式、媒體和目標裝置，供呼叫擷取資料之 的指標。

span.span: A pointer to the defining the format, medium, and target device for calls to retrieve data.

param.name: b
param.span: 的指標，表示包含傳回資料的儲存媒體。

span.span: A pointer to the indicating the storage medium containing the returned data.

summary.span: 呈現指定 pFormatEtc 結構中所描述的資料，並將其傳輸至 參數。

span.span: Renders the data that is described in the specified pFormatEtc structure and transfers it to the parameter.

Docs.returns:
GetData 方法支援標準傳回值 E_INVALIDARG、E_UNEXPECTED 和 E_OUTOFMEMORY，以及下列傳回值：The GetData method supports the standard return values E_INVALIDARG, E_UNEXPECTED, and E_OUTOFMEMORY, as well as the following return values:
| 傳回值 | 描述 | | --- | --- | | S\_OK | 這個對 GetData 方法的呼叫已成功擷取資料，並將其放置在所提供的儲存媒體中。| Return value | Description | | --- | --- | | S\_OK | This call to the GetData method successfully retrieved and placed data in the provided storage medium. | | DV\_E\_LINDEX | lindex 無效。| | DV\_E\_LINDEX | lindex is not valid. | | DV\_E\_FORMATETC | 無效。| | DV\_E\_FORMATETC | is not valid. | | DV\_E\_TYMED | tymed 無效。| | DV\_E\_TYMED | tymed is not valid. | | DV\_E\_DVASPECT | dwAspect 無效。| | DV\_E\_DVASPECT | dwAspect is not valid. | | OLE\_E\_NOTRUNNING | 物件應用程式不在執行中。| | OLE\_E\_NOTRUNNING | The object application is not running. | | STG\_E\_MEDIUMFULL | 配置媒體時發生錯誤。| | STG\_E\_MEDIUMFULL | An error occurred when allocating the medium. |

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需有關使用程式設計介面和 Microsoft Management Console (MMC)，請參閱 < [MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview)。For more information about programming with the interface and the Microsoft Management Console (MMC), see the [MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview).

abstract member GetDataHere : * -> int

param.name: pFormatEtc
param.span: 定義格式、媒體和目標裝置，供呼叫擷取資料之 的指標。

span.span: A pointer to the defining the format, medium, and target device for calls to retrieve data.

param.span: 的指標，表示包含傳回資料的儲存媒體。

span.span: A pointer to the indicating the storage medium containing the returned data.

summary.span: 呈現指定 pFormatEtc 結構中所描述的資料，並將其傳輸至 參數。

span.span: Renders the data that is described in the specified pFormatEtc structure and transfers it to the parameter.

Docs.returns:
GetDataHere 方法支援標準傳回值 E_INVALIDARG、E_UNEXPECTED 和 E_OUTOFMEMORY，以及下列傳回值：The GetDataHere method supports the standard return values E_INVALIDARG, E_UNEXPECTED, and E_OUTOFMEMORY, as well as the following return values:
| 傳回值 | 描述 | | --- | --- | | S\_OK | 這個 GetDataHere 方法的呼叫已成功擷取資料，並將其放置在所提供的儲存媒體中。| Return value | Description | | --- | --- | | S\_OK | This call to the GetDataHere method successfully retrieved and placed data in the provided storage medium. | | DV\_E\_LINDEX | lindex 無效。| | DV\_E\_LINDEX | lindex is not valid. | | DV\_E\_FORMATETC | pFormatEtc 無效。| | DV\_E\_FORMATETC | pFormatEtc is not valid. | | DV\_E\_TYMED | tymed 無效。| | DV\_E\_TYMED | tymed is not valid. | | DV\_E\_DVASPECT | dwAspect 無效。| | DV\_E\_DVASPECT | dwAspect is not valid. | | OLE\_E\_NOTRUNNING | 物件應用程式不在執行中。| | OLE\_E\_NOTRUNNING | The object application is not running. | | STG\_E\_MEDIUMFULL | 配置媒體時發生錯誤。| | STG\_E\_MEDIUMFULL | An error occurred when allocating the medium. |

remarks.format: ## Remarks GetDataHere 方法不同於方法呼叫端必須針對後者配置及釋放指定的存放媒體。The GetDataHere method differs from the method in that the caller must allocate and release the specified storage medium. 如需有關使用程式設計介面和 Microsoft Management Console (MMC)，請參閱 < [MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview)。For more information about programming with the interface and the Microsoft Management Console (MMC), see the [MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview).

MemberSignature.Value: public int QueryGetData (Microsoft.Aspnet.Snapin.FORMATETC a);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 QueryGetData(valuetype Microsoft.Aspnet.Snapin.FORMATETC a) cil managed
Public Function QueryGetData (a As FORMATETC) As Integer
public: int QueryGetData(Microsoft::Aspnet::Snapin::FORMATETC a);
abstract member QueryGetData : Microsoft.Aspnet.Snapin.FORMATETC -> int

param.name: a
param.span: 定義格式、媒體和目標裝置，供呼叫擷取資料之 的指標。

span.span: A pointer to the defining the format, medium, and target device for calls to retrieve data.

summary.span: 擷取值，指出實作器是否可以呈現 參數中所含的資料。

span.span: Retrieves a value indicating whether the implementer can render the data that is contained in the parameter.

Docs.returns:
QueryGetData 方法支援標準傳回值 E_INVALIDARG、E_UNEXPECTED 和 E_OUTOFMEMORY，以及下列傳回值：The QueryGetData method supports the standard return values E_INVALIDARG, E_UNEXPECTED, and E_OUTOFMEMORY, as well as the following return values:
| 傳回值 | 描述 | | --- | --- | | S\_OK | 對 方法的後續呼叫可能會成功。| Return value | Description | | --- | --- | | S\_OK | A subsequent call to the method probably will be successful. | | DV\_E\_LINDEX | lindex 無效。| | DV\_E\_LINDEX | lindex is not valid. | | DV\_E\_FORMATETC | pFormatEtc 無效。| | DV\_E\_FORMATETC | pFormatEtc is not valid. | | DV\_E\_TYMED | tymed 無效。| | DV\_E\_TYMED | tymed is not valid. | | DV\_E\_DVASPECT | dwAspect 值。| | DV\_E\_DVASPECT | dwAspect value. | | OLE\_E\_NOTRUNNING | 物件應用程式不在執行中。| | OLE\_E\_NOTRUNNING | The object application is not running. |

remarks.format: ## Remarks 資料物件實作的用戶端介面呼叫 QueryGetData 方法，以決定後續呼叫的成功機率方法。A client of a data object that implements the interface calls the QueryGetData method to determine the likelihood of success of a subsequent call to the method. 結果，指出這個執行個體介面可以呈現資料中包含`a`參數不保證成功，後續呼叫中的方法。A result indicating that this instance of the interface can render the data that is contained in the `a` parameter does not guarantee success in a subsequent call to the method. 如需有關使用程式設計介面和 Microsoft Management Console (MMC)，請參閱 < [MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview)。For more information about programming with the interface and the Microsoft Management Console (MMC), see the [MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview).

MemberSignature.Value: public int SetData (IntPtr a, IntPtr b, int c);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 SetData(native int a, native int b, int32 c) cil managed
Public Function SetData (a As IntPtr, b As IntPtr, c As Integer) As Integer
public: int SetData(IntPtr a, IntPtr b, int c);
abstract member SetData : nativeint * nativeint * int -> int

param.name: a
param.span: 定義資料物件格式之 的指標，該資料物件會實作要在解譯儲存媒體中所含資料時使用的 。

span.span: A pointer to the defining the format for the data object implementing the to use when interpreting the data contained in the storage medium.

param.name: b
param.span: 指標，定義用於傳遞資料的 SetData 方法儲存媒體。

span.span: A pointer to the defining the storage medium for the SetData method to use to pass the data.

param.name: c
param.span: 若要指定實作 的所呼叫資料物件在呼叫後擁有儲存媒體，且必須在使用後釋放媒體，則為 true；若要指定由呼叫端保留儲存媒體的擁有權，且資料物件只能在呼叫期間使用媒體，則為 false。

span.span: true to specify that the called data object implementing the owns the storage medium after the call and must free the medium after it has been used; otherwise, false to specify the caller retains ownership of the storage medium and the data object uses the medium for the duration of the call only.

summary.span: 將 所參考之 結構中所包含的資料，傳輸至這個 介面執行個體。

span.span: Transfers the data that is contained in the structure, referenced by , to this instance of the interface.

Docs.returns:
SetData 方法支援標準傳回值 E_FAIL、E_INVALIDARG、E_UNEXPECTED 和 E_OUTOFMEMORY，以及下列傳回值：The SetData method supports the standard return values E_FAIL, E_INVALIDARG, E_UNEXPECTED, and E_OUTOFMEMORY, as well as the following return values:
| 傳回值 | 描述 | | --- | --- | | S\_OK | 這個 SetData 方法的呼叫已成功傳輸資料。| Return value | Description | | --- | --- | | S\_OK | This call to the SetData method successfully transferred the data. | | E\_NOTIMPL | 沒有為實作 的資料物件實作 SetData 方法。| | E\_NOTIMPL | The SetData method is not implemented for the data object implementing the . | | DV\_E\_LINDEX | lindex 無效。| | DV\_E\_LINDEX | lindex is not valid. | | DV\_E\_FORMATETC | pFormatEtc 無效。| | DV\_E\_FORMATETC | pFormatEtc is not valid. | | DV\_E\_TYMED | tymed 無效。| | DV\_E\_TYMED | tymed is not valid. | | DV\_E\_DVASPECT | dwAspect 無效。| | DV\_E\_DVASPECT | dwAspect is not valid. | | OLE\_E\_NOTRUNNING | 物件應用程式不在執行中。| | OLE\_E\_NOTRUNNING | The object application is not running. |

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需有關使用程式設計介面和 Microsoft Management Console (MMC)，請參閱 < [MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview)。For more information about programming with the interface and the Microsoft Management Console (MMC), see the [MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview).
